description:
At the law firm of Plaxen & Adler, P.A., we believe in protecting the rights of all of the residents of Maryland, especially those who suffer because of another person's negligence. If you live in Gambrills or the surrounding area, you can depend on our law firm's attorneys for personal injury representation. We regularly represent clients who need assistance with the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Defective products
  • Dog bites
  • Fungal meningitis
  • Medical malpractice, including birth injuries
  • Premises liability, including slip and falls and elevator and escalator injuries
  • Workers’ compensation and Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death

Our firm's three attorneys have more than 60 years of combined legal experience. In addition, our attorneys have the respect of their peers in the legal community, and regularly receive state and national recognition for their abilities. Our law firm's founder, Bruce Plaxen, is the only two-time winner of the Maryland Association for Justice's President's Award.

If you are suffering after an accident that resulted from another's negligent act, you can turn to our law firm for help. If you lost a loved one because a property owner, manufacturer or medical professional was negligent, you too can count on Plaxen & Adler, P.A., for assistance. Regardless of the incident that led to your suffering, our personal injury attorneys will dedicate themselves to your case.

If you would like to learn how you could benefit from choosing our firm, you can schedule a free initial consultation at any one of our office locations. We also offer evening and weekend appointments, and will come to you if you are unable to travel.
